title: Collaborative Problem-Solving-Based Mathematics Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic arithmetic operations and problem-solving skills for everyday life
context.additional_context: Learners can share simple materials via smartphones but have relatively low proficiency with digital tools

learning_goals: Learners enhance their ability to systematically propose ideas while collaboratively solving real-life-based complex math problems.
Learners acquire methods to improve problem-solving processes by utilizing metacognitive regulation strategies (e.g., review, feedback requests) within group settings
Learners develop the ability to represent co-constructed knowledge artifacts (products generated through collaborative knowledge building) with mathematical precision

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
